body: @longtimeago it's yours now, please proceed keeping in mind [our principles](http://www.tpc2.com/dev/principles). Feel free to ask any technical questions right here in the ticket
@longtimeago This task's budget is **30 mins**. This is exactly how much will be paid when the problem explained above is solved. See [this](http://www.tpc2.com/dev/principles) for more information

@yegor256 Could you please clarify the issue.
As far as I understand, backporting is applying some fixes to old version, so in our case it should be merging current master to 0.7.2. But you propose the opposite.
@yegor256 Also the problem is that I don't really know what changes should stay in merge result and what should be moved (in case of conflicts)

Maybe I'm wrong about using "backporting" here, but the idea is that we should merge tag `jcabi-0.7.2` into `master` branch. The only change made there is that we started to use jcabi-http 1.0, instead of rexsl-test.

Good, I'll do this tonight
Thanks!

@yegor256 Unfortunately, merge became not so easy, as we have got dependency hell

```
[INFO] Checking runtime classpath
[WARNING] Found duplicate classes in [com.sun.istack:istack-commons-runtime:2.16,com.sun.xml.bind:jaxb-core:2.2.8-b01] :
[WARNING]   com.sun.istack.Builder
[WARNING]   com.sun.istack.ByteArrayDataSource
[WARNING]   com.sun.istack.FinalArrayList
[WARNING]   com.sun.istack.FragmentContentHandler
[WARNING]   com.sun.istack.Interned
[WARNING]   com.sun.istack.NotNull
[WARNING]   com.sun.istack.Nullable
[WARNING]   com.sun.istack.Pool
[WARNING]   com.sun.istack.SAXException2
[WARNING]   com.sun.istack.SAXParseException2
[WARNING]   com.sun.istack.XMLStreamException2
[WARNING]   com.sun.istack.XMLStreamReaderToContentHandler
[WARNING]   com.sun.istack.localization.Localizable
[WARNING]   com.sun.istack.localization.LocalizableMessage
[WARNING]   com.sun.istack.localization.LocalizableMessageFactory
[WARNING]   com.sun.istack.localization.Localizer
[WARNING]   com.sun.istack.localization.NullLocalizable
[WARNING]   com.sun.istack.logging.Logger
```

as we have jaxb-impl twice in runtime classpath
1) from jcabi-http directly
2) from jcabi-http -> rexl-test
I think we should _exclude_ rexsl-test from jcabi-http. I think this is exactly what is happening in 0.7.2, isn't it?

there were no excludes in 0.7.2, but OK
I'll try

@yegor256 Please, review and if all is OK merge ASAP
Too many changes ...
@yegor256 As it's OK, please close the issue. Thanks!
